# ğŸš€ CareerBoost â€” AI-Powered Resume & Career Builder

**CareerBoost** is a full-stack AI-powered platform that helps users create professional, ATS-friendly resumes, cover letters, LinkedIn summaries, and portfolio content â€” all generated by AI in seconds.

Built with **FastAPI**, **React + Tailwind**, and **fine-tuned LLMs**, this project can be deployed as a SaaS product or offered as a white-label career-building solution.

---

## âœ¨ Key Features

### ğŸ§¾ Resume Builder
- Generate polished, ATS-compliant resumes instantly
- Choose from modern professional templates
- Download in PDF format

### ğŸ’Œ Cover Letter Generator
- AI-crafted, job-specific cover letters
- Custom tone (formal, creative, concise)
- Download in PDF format

### ğŸ¯ Job Fit Analyzer
- Upload a job description and analyze how well your profile fits
- Get personalized improvement suggestions

### ğŸ’¼ LinkedIn Optimizer
- Rewrite or enhance your LinkedIn â€œAboutâ€ section and job descriptions
- Improve visibility to recruiters

### ğŸ§  AI Model
- Fine-tuned on real resume, cover letter, and portfolio datasets
- Can be extended or re-trained using LoRA adapters

## ğŸ—ï¸ Tech Stack

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|-------------|
| **Frontend** | React, Vite, Tailwind CSS |
| **Backend** | FastAPI (Python) |
| **AI Model** | Fine-tuned LLM (Gemini / GPT / Phi-2) |
| **Database** | MySql (configurable) |
| **Styling** | ShadCN/UI + Tailwind Components |
| **Auth** | JWT / OAuth (optional) |
